00001 #ifndef SIMPLE_VECTOR_HEADER
00002 #define SIMPLE_VECTOR_HEADER

00004 #include "stxxl/bits/common/utils.h"

00007 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE

00009 template < class _Tp /*, class _Alloc=__STL_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR(_Tp) */  >
00010 class simple_vector
00011 {
00012     simple_vector ()
00013     { }
00014 public:
00015     typedef size_t size_type;
00016     typedef _Tp value_type;
00017 //  typedef simple_alloc<_Tp, _Alloc> _data_allocator;
00018 protected:
00019     size_type _size;
00020     value_type * _array;
00021 
00022 private:
00023     simple_vector & operator = (const simple_vector &); // forbidden
00024     simple_vector(const simple_vector &); // forbidden
00025 public:
00026 
00027     typedef value_type * iterator;
00028     typedef const value_type * const_iterator;
00029     typedef value_type & reference;
00030     typedef const value_type & const_reference;
00031 
00032     simple_vector (size_type sz) : _size (sz)
00033     {
00034         //assert(sz);
00035         //    _array = _data_allocator.allocate(sz);
00036         _array = new _Tp[sz];
00037     }
00038     void swap(simple_vector & obj)
00039     {
00040         std::swap(_size, obj._size);
00041         std::swap(_array, obj._array);
00042     }
00043     ~simple_vector ()
00044     {
00045         //    _data_allocator.deallocate(_array,_size);
00046         delete [] _array;
00047     }
00048     iterator begin ()
00049     {
00050         return _array;
00051     }
00052     const_iterator begin () const
00053     {
00054         return _array;
00055     }
00056     iterator end ()
00057     {
00058         return _array + _size;
00059     }
00060     const_iterator end () const
00061     {
00062         return _array + _size;
00063     }
00064     size_type size () const
00065     {
00066         return _size;
00067     }
00068     reference operator [] (size_type i)
00069     {
00070         return *(begin () + i);
00071     }
00072     const_reference operator [] (size_type i) const
00073     {
00074         return *(begin () + i);
00075     }
00076 };
00077 __STXXL_END_NAMESPACE
00078 
00079 namespace std
00080 {
00081     template <class Tp_>
00082     void swap(      stxxl::simple_vector < Tp_ > & a,
00083                     stxxl::simple_vector<Tp_> & b)
00084     {
00085         a.swap(b);
00086     }
00087 }
